ca.ualberta.trinkettrader.Trades

Class TradeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.trinkettrader.Trades.TradeManager

  • public class TradeManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages a user's trades. Each user will have a TradeManager. The TradeManager will be used when a user creates a new trade, deletes a trade, proposes a counter trade, or changes the status of a trade (accepts or declines the trade). Trade manager works with the TradeArchiver class to store and access a user's trades and with the NotificationManager class to notify

    • Constructor Detail

      • TradeManager

        Public Constructor

    • Method Detail

      • proposeTrade

        public void proposeTrade(Trade trade)
        Propose trade. Adds created trade to the currentTrades ArrayLists of both the borrower and the owner. Notifies the user who did not instantiate the trade that they have been made a new offer.
        Parameters:
        trade -

      • pullTrades

        public java.util.ArrayList<Trade> pullTrades()
        Pulls offered trades when user is online. When a user is offline, they will not be able to receive trade offers from other users. When the user is online, this method will be called to update the user's currentTrades ArrayList.
        Returns:
        ArrayList<Trade> ArrayList of trades that were offered to the user when they were offline

      • proposeCounterTrade

        public void proposeCounterTrade(Trade trade,
                                Trade counterTrade)
        Propose counter trade. Replaces previously offered trade in the currentTrades ArrayList of both the borrower and the owner with updated trade. Previous trade will be deleted and updated trade will be added. Counter trade details will be determined by the user who was last offered the trade.
        Parameters:
        trade - previous trade to delete
        counterTrade - updated counter trade to add

      • acceptTrade

        public void acceptTrade(Trade trade,
                        java.lang.String comments)
        Accept trade Sets status of trade to "accepted", deletes trade in borrower's and owner's currentTrades ArrayLists, and adds trade to borrower's and owner's pastTrades ArrayLists. Calls method which will send a notification email to both borrower and owner with relevant trade information and comments. Comments will be determined by owner. currentTrades and pastTrades ArrayLists are accessed through TradeArchiver.
        Parameters:
        trade -
        comments -

      • declineTrade

        public void declineTrade(Trade trade)
        Decline trade. Sets status of trade to "declined", deletes trade in borrower's and owner's currentTrades ArrayLists, and adds trade to borrower's and owner's pastTrades ArrayLists. currentTrades and pastTrades ArrayLists are accessed through TradeArchiver.
        Parameters:
        trade -

      • deleteTrade

        public void deleteTrade(Trade trade)
        Deletes specified trade from currentTrades ArrayList. Trades will never be deleted from pastTrades ArrayList. This method will only be used to update the currentTrades ArrayList when a trade is no longer active (ie. trade has been accepted, declined or deleted).
        Parameters:
        trade -

      • getTradeArchiver

        public TradeArchiver getTradeArchiver()
        Returns user's trade archiver. Trade archiver is needed to access and manipulate a user's current and past trades. Please see TradeArchiver for more information.
        Returns:
        TradeArchiver

      • getNotificationManager

        public NotificationManager getNotificationManager()
        Returns user's notification manager. Notification manager is responsible for notifying a user of a new trades (new offer) and a completed trades. Please see NotificationManager class for more information.
        Returns:
        NotificationManager
